page.title: 04INDUSTRY IN NORTH SHEFFIELD
page.content: The industry of the area,{mainly light {engineering,}follows the course of the river. Where factories have closed or houses have been demolished some of the land is derelict and grass covered.At Malin Bridge{an undershot {water wheel}remains in working order but the mill is now used as an electrical discount warehouse. Many back to back houses were connected to old factories, many of which are still used for producing similar materials to those they did before, e.g.files,tools,silver platers etc. There is{a new industrial estate to the east of Neepsend Lane which houses many small businesses in 'lock-up' type accomodation. At the junction of Bradfield Rd. and Penistone Rd.there are{two large heavy {engineering works,}one of which still has{a drop forge}audible from afar.
